page.title: 01THE RURAL AREA OF SHARDLOW
page.content:
Our Domesday block covers the rural area of{Thulston, Elvaston, Ambaston} and part of{Shardlow,}an area approx 6 miles south east of Derby;Grid ref no.04400330.
{Thulston, Elvaston}and{Ambaston}are small quiet hamlets administered by Elvaston Parish Council.The hamlets consist of private houses and farms.There is a public house called the Harrington Arms at{Thulston}which is busy at weekends.There are no shops in any of these hamlets.Children from {Elvaston}and{Thulston}go to school at Alvaston,whilst those from{Ambaston} attend Shardlow Primary School.
The smallest hamlet Ambaston is 1.5 miles from Shardlow and a narrow country lane joins them, (continued on page 2).
